name: Krusty Kombat
description:
Welcome to Krusty Kombat, a delightful and action-packed local multiplayer arena brawler set deep beneath the waves, where hermit crabs have found a unique way to protect themselves - by utilizing sunken pirate ships as their shells! Gather your friends and prepare for an underwater adventure like no other.

In this frenetic and engaging brawler, players take control of their very own hermit crab, each outfitted with a tiny, yet formidable pirate ship as their shell. In these extraordinary vessels, crabs will navigate the treacherous depths of the ocean, battling it out for underwater supremacy.

Featuring charming visuals and an immersive aquatic atmosphere, Krusty Kombat can be enjoyed by up to 48 players. Face off against your friends or team up to conquer the ocean together, as you shoot cannons and outmaneuver opponents.

Throughout each match, players will face numerous obstacles to become the ultimate hermit crab pirate!

Key Features:

  • Local multiplayer mayhem for up to 48 players
  • Fast-paced, action-packed gameplay with a unique underwater setting
  • Charming visuals and lively aquatic atmosphere

Are you ready to rule the ocean depths and claim victory over your friends? Hoist your sails and prepare for battle in Krusty Kombat, the ultimate underwater arena brawler!
